title: The Reawakened
description: She is Rhia, bound to the Spirit of Crow and gifted with vision. In a world besieged by escalating conflict, fate has marked her to deliver the Reawakened from oppression.Now, with a mighty army of Descendants threatening to crush what's left of her people's magic, she must trust an ancient prophecy and accept the power that is her birthright�the power of life and death itself.For while the storm of revolution rages, the legacy of the Reawakened is about to be rewritten…in her family's blood.
author: Jeri Smith-Ready
